name: Don't Steal From Rex!
description:
=====REQUIRES AUDIO=====

This was submitted for CCAW JAM 3. The Game Jam hosted by Computer Club at Western Michigan University.

Theme: Rightful Owner.

In this game you play as a 'theif' you are breaking into a home and are searching for precious diamonds. Using your lock picking skills you'll open locked containers and get all of the diamonds and then get back to the car where your get away driver is waiting. If Rex wakes up you can hide in specific parts of the map.

WASD - Move.

E - Use / Unlock

Listen for a "DING" when lockpicking and press E right when you hear it to unlock.
